Keywords: Fawcett City , Justice League , Mystical
Real Name: Mary Batson
Special Powers
TO PROTECT MY FAMILY: Defend. // When a friendly character within range and line of fire would be targeted by an attack, you may roll a d6. 4-6: Place Mary Shazam adjacent to that character and she becomes the target of the attack, even if it would be illegal.
LONG STORY SHORT... WE'RE ALL SUPER HEROES!: Charge, but do not halve speed.
SHAZAM!: Once per turn, when Mary Shazam hits an opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions she may make a close attack using Quake and must choose to target all adjacent characters.
Figure Errata
Changed "Shazam!"
Trade Mary Shazam Want Mary Shazam

Comments
May 24, 2021
Coyote's Own
"If i had, say the Enchanted ball & chain, that gives me quake but i do my printed damage, would i be able to use that quake as my free quake?" Rule question, rule forum , etc. No. You need to use Quake that is part of the special power. If the power said "When she uses quake she uses it as Free" would mean she could use quake from any source.
May 24, 2021
zharkman
If i had, say the Enchanted ball & chain, that gives me quake but i do my printed damage, would i be able to use that quake as my free quake?
May 11, 2021
Brundun94
Right, I understand that the clarification must be made, but it feels worded as it would have under the context of the 2017 rules; ie. It implies that Quake would otherwise be another type of action (CLOSE, like it used to be) if it wasn't FREE, whereas now it just.... is. While it's arguing syntax I suppose, since it still works the intended way, regardless, I believe a wording more contemporary to the 2021 rules changes probably should have been, "Quake. ...after resolutions this character may make a close attack as FREE, but only to use Quake." It's worth noting in my example that they left her in-question as to whether she is considered to be able to use Quake at all times on those first three clicks, or only when a successful attack occurs, triggering it into existence for the duration of thay attack. It's... interestingly phrased. Based on the CRB, I would imagine the latter. Certainly it's a corner case issue, but it is unnecessarily open ended.
May 10, 2021
Majinmagog2
It says Quake as free because she can only free to use quake. She can't just attack as free. She has to use quake.
May 10, 2021
Brundun94
It's interesting to me that her sp would still say "use Quake as FREE", implying there was still the old rule in mind, as Quake no longer requires an action of its own; it effectively an attack modifier. I suppose it still works under the new rules, or they'll errata it, but for the set hailed as intentionally created to turn a new page with the rules, there are glaring design flaws/oversights/quality failures, showing that this wasn't long thought out, but rushed.
April 26, 2021
pokolo
gotta try her with Mjolnir. or the Octopus Arms.
February 22, 2021
Top10
This is a good example of how benched powers are going to work. The full movement charge is appropriate over HSS and the added possibility for quake is an excellent boost. This sculpt looks amazing. Little surprised on leadership but I have no complaints.

GL_Alex
Kind of wish there was some Hypersonic on Mary. Full movement charge is good, but I like having the movement options. Her Shazam! attack will be useful for breaking up huddles.
